com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier

Class VerificationContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.VerificationContextBuilder

  • public class VerificationContextBuilder
extends Object
    This class is used to createSignature VerificationContext instances.

      • setSignature

        public VerificationContextBuilder setSignature(KSISignature signature)
        Used to set the KSI signature that is verified.
        Parameters:
        signature - signature to verify.
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setPublicationsFile

        public VerificationContextBuilder setPublicationsFile(PublicationsFile publicationsFile)
        Used to set the publications file that is used by verification process
        Parameters:
        publicationsFile - instance of publications file. may be null.
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setUserPublication

        public VerificationContextBuilder setUserPublication(PublicationData userPublication)
        Used to set the user publication (e.g from newspaper). Used by UserProvidedPublicationBasedVerificationPolicy.
        Parameters:
        userPublication - instance of publication data. may be null.
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setExtendingAllowed

        public VerificationContextBuilder setExtendingAllowed(boolean extendingAllowed)
        If true then extending is allowed when verifying signature. Does not affect CalendarBasedVerificationPolicy policy.
        Parameters:
        extendingAllowed - true if extending is allowed, false otherwise
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setExtenderClient

        public VerificationContextBuilder setExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient extenderClient)
        Used to set the KSIExtenderClient to be used to extend signature.
        Parameters:
        extenderClient - instance of extender client
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setExtendingService

        public VerificationContextBuilder setExtendingService(KSIExtendingService extendingService)
        Used to set the KSIExtendingService to be used to extend signature.
        Parameters:
        extendingService - instance of extending service
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setDocumentHash

        public VerificationContextBuilder setDocumentHash(DataHash documentHash,
                                                  Long level)
        Used to set the hash and local aggregation tree height. If present then this hash must equal to signature input hash.
        Parameters:
        documentHash - document hash
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

      • setDocumentHash

        public VerificationContextBuilder setDocumentHash(DataHash documentHash)
        Used to set the hash of the original document. If present then this hash must equal to signature input hash.
        Parameters:
        documentHash - document hash
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationContextBuilder

        public VerificationContext build()

      • createVerificationContext

        @Deprecated
public final VerificationContext createVerificationContext()
                                                                throws KSIException
        Deprecated. 
        Builds the verification context.
        Returns:
        instance of verification context
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g mandatory parameters aren't present)
